tools.name: rossum_get_queues
tools.description: Get all queues from the Rossum organization.

tools.name: rossum_get_schema
tools.description:
Get a specific schema by its ID.
    
    Args:
        schema_id: The ID of the schema to retrieve

schema_id.description: The ID of the schema to retrieve

tools.name: rossum_get_hooks
tools.description: Get all serverless function hooks from the Rossum organization.

tools.name: rossum_get_hook
tools.description:
Get a specific serverless function hook by its ID, including its source code.
    
    Args:
        hook_id: The ID of the hook to retrieve

hook_id.description: The ID of the hook to retrieve

tools.name: rossum_get_workspaces
tools.description: Get all workspaces from the Rossum organization.

tools.name: rossum_get_workspace
tools.description:
Get a specific workspace by its ID.
    
    Args:
        workspace_id: The ID of the workspace to retrieve

workspace_id.description: The ID of the workspace to retrieve
